name: Puckin' Hell
description: Puckin' Hell is a top down action brawler set in the icy depths of hell, you play as a hockey player making their descent into Hell. The game takes inspiration from gory fast paced brawlers like Hotline Miami.  The development blog can be found here: https://zacklovell.wordpress.com/2022/05/07/team-14-development-blog/
